exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 1 branch or a conjunctive pattern made of 2 patterns.

original: intros P H x contra. unfold not in contra. induction x as [|pn IHpn]. - apply (contra (0,0)%nat). - apply IHpn. intros [z1 z2] Hpz. apply contra. specialize (H (z1, z2) Hpz). destruct H as [z [H1 H2]]. exists z. auto.
